title: 이달의소녀탐구 #412 (LOONA TV #412)
members: Yves, Go Won, HeeJin, Kim Lip, Chuu
summary:
0:01 -- LOOΠΔ is still performing favOriTe.
0:12 -- Go Won and Yves: "We are the smurfs now!" Go Won asks Yves if her hair got dyed by the blue powder.
0:22 -- HeeJin got color all over her by standing in the center. "And I got a kind of punishment~". Kim Lip says they were actually happy as they were in the middle but it looked like a punishment.
0:34 -- Yves: "I am kind of a mess right now." Chuu pops in:"We will wash up!" yyxy shows off their 'nail art' and the episode with a jump.
0:41 -- She tries to playfully punch her but instead whacks her neck. "Cut Cut Cut! Edit it!"
0:44 -- YeoJin shows up and thinks she noticed it first but is dissappointed to hear that she isn't the first one. "I'll work hard so don't worry."
